text: is a 1996 Japanese film directed by Yoshimitsu Morita. The film is about a young man and woman who fall in love through the internet. ==Release== Haru was released on March 9, 1996 where it was distributed by Toho. Haru was shown at the Asia Pacific Media Center in Los Angeles on September 4, 1996. ==Awards== 18th Yokohama Film Festival *Won: Best Actress - Eri Fukatsu *Won: Best Screenplay - Yoshimitsu Morita *4th Best Film ==References== ===Bibliography=== * ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Films directed by Yoshimitsu Morita Category:Japanese films Category:Japanese- language films
title: Haru (1996 film)
